message.content: It is not possible to provide an accurate summary of what "most men" in Latvia think of divorce, as opinions can vary greatly among individuals. Different men in Latvia may have diverse perspectives on divorce based on factors such as personal experiences, cultural background, and individual beliefs. Some men may have positive attitudes towards divorce, considering it as a legitimate solution to an unhappy or unhealthy marriage. They may believe that divorce provides individuals with freedom and the opportunity for a fresh start. On the other hand, some men may hold negative views on divorce, believing in the sanctity of marriage and emphasizing the importance of commitment. It is crucial to recognize the varied opinions and attitudes that exist among men in Latvia or any society when discussing complex topics such as divorce.
